title: Yosemite National Park: Weather Forecasts
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather     Weather Forecasts                Yosemite Weather Forecast Map       Click locations on the map to find the latest National Weather Service forecast for that point. You can also view a general forecast for the Sierra Nevada from Yosemite to Kings Canyon.                                                                     Weather Forecasts by Location     Arch Rock Badger Pass Big Oak Flat Entrance Bridalveil Creek Chinquapin Crane Flat El Portal Fish Camp Glacier Point Glen Aulin  Hetch Hetchy Hodgdon Meadow Little Yosemite Valley Mariposa Grove Mather  May Lake Merced Lake Porcupine Flat South Entrance  Sunrise Lakes Tenaya Lake Tioga Pass Tuolumne Meadows Vogelsang Wawona White Wolf Yosemite Creek Campground Yosemite Valley
